name: PinBall Master 3D
description:
This is the most interesting game.
Everyone will play for a very long time, so be careful not to get angry with your mom.

In this game you have to hit the ball with a pin to score a goal.
It's very difficult. You won't be able to reach level 100.

Enjoy this puzzle game!

Collect cool play with the goal of becoming a pinball master!
You can do anything !!
